about.title: NATALIA VILLALOBOS
about.description: I am an independent brand designer based in Costa Rica. I specialize in creating strategic brands, social media content, and unique websites that resonate with your audience. With a keen eye for aesthetics and a deep understanding of strategy, my expertise will take your brand from ordinary to exceptional.
about.what_i_do_description: As a brand designer, I craft unique visual identities that resonate with audiences. I create compelling logos, cohesive branding materials, and engaging visual elements.
about.why_i_do_it_description: I am passionate about helping brands tell their stories through design. I believe that a well-designed brand can transform a business, build trust, and forge meaningful connections with its audience.
about.how_i_do_it_description: I start with a deep understanding of each client's vision and goals, followed by a thorough research and creative exploration process. My approach involves meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality, tailored solutions. Through collaboration and creativity, I ensure that each brand design is both visually striking and strategically sound.
about.work_together_text_1: If you're ready to start a new dream project, click the button
about.work_together_text_2: below to fill my enquiry form so we can work together!

home.text_box: Let’s build a bold, standout brand! I’ll guide you through the design process, offering advice and helping you reach your goals—while making it an enjoyable journey.
home.testimony_1: I loved the entire process from start to finish, from the Zoom meeting to the final delivery of the project. You showed so much dedication to the project, researching the brand, what we do, and why we do it. Plus, every design you created for us was filled with creativity.
home.testimony_2: Natalia is a great designer, creative and professional. She helped us create our brand from scratch, just as we imagined it. I would love to work with her again.
home.testimony_3: It was a pleasure working with you. Your quality of work and attention to detail resulted in a professional design that exceeded expectations. You delivered on time, and communication was excellent.

services.branding_description: Crafting a unique and strategic identity for your business that resonates with your target audience. From logo design to complete brand guidelines, we ensure your brand stands out.
services.collaterals_description: Creating essential brand collaterals like business cards, packaging, and promotional materials that maintain brand consistency and enhance your marketing efforts.
services.social_description: Elevating your social media presence with engaging content and cohesive visuals. We create strategies and designs that drive engagement and build your online community.
services.web_description: Designing user-friendly, visually stunning websites that reflect your brand's identity. We focus on functionality and aesthetics to provide an exceptional user experience.
services.photography_description: Capturing high-quality images that align with your brand’s identity. Whether it's product photography, lifestyle shots, or corporate headshots, we ensure your visuals tell your brand's story.
services.faq_question_1: What is the one concept method?
services.faq_answer_1: The One Concept Method is an approach where I focus all my time and energy on creating a single, powerful design concept for your brand. This method ensures a clear direction, allowing us to perfect and refine it to best represent your brand's vision and values.
services.faq_question_2: If I already have a logo, can I hire a branding or social media package?
services.faq_answer_2: Each project is developed with passion, aiming to represent the vision and values of your brand in the best way possible. Therefore, I offer my clients a review of their existing elements and logo to assess if they are effective. If they work well, only the necessary changes or additions will be made to create a visual identity more aligned with your audience.
services.faq_question_3: How can I work with you on designing my brand?
services.faq_answer_3: You can contact me through the contact form on my website to discuss your branding needs and goals. Together, we will create a personalized design strategy.
services.faq_question_4: How long does the design process take?
services.faq_answer_4: The time required to complete a design project may vary depending on its complexity. We will work together to establish a realistic timeline and meet your deadlines.
services.faq_answer_5: I am well aware that your brand design is an investment, therefore, the total amount is divided into two payments: 50% upfront to secure your spot, and the remaining 50% upon delivery of the final files.
services.faq_question_6: Do you offer any other services besides social media and branding?
services.faq_answer_6: Yes, I can also assist you with creating additional brand elements, such as business cards, corporate stationery, packaging, website design, social media templates, product photography, brand GIFs, and more.
services.faq_answer_7: Just a logo. Brand design without strategy. I don't work hastily; I take the necessary time to ensure that I deliver quality results.
